Family law, bankruptcy, housing, criminal records expunction.", "email": "", "url": "https://lawprogram.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "501 1st Avenue North", "address_2": "Suite 420", "city": "St. Petersburg", "state_province": "FL", "postal_code": "33701", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 27.7725556, "longitude": -82.6405302}, "phones": [{"number": "(727) 582-7402", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
